model.network

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • model.network.Server
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Server
extends java.lang.Thread
    The Server Thread that sends all the information to a single Client, including Player positions and Entity updates, then delegates to the GameController
    Author:
    Reuben Puketapu - 300310939
